contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your next project or collaboration opportunity!
contact.name: Name
contact.aboutText:
Hi!

I'm Konit, a passionate developer based in Kushiro, a small city in Japan. I specialize in mobile app development with over 2 years of software development experience.

I'm interested not just in coding, but in solving real user problems. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and share that knowledge.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy planning new services.
contact.interestsList: Mobile Development, Flutter, Architecture, AI/ML, Mathematics, Biology, Marketing
